org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.datamodel

Class SortableTableModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
      • org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.datamodel.SortableTableModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, TableModel
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractIndexTableModel, BaseDNTableModel, ConnectionHandlersMonitoringTableModel, ConnectionHandlerTableModel, DatabaseMonitoringTableModel, TaskTableModel

    public abstract class SortableTableModel
extends AbstractTableModel
    A generic interface that must implement table models that are sortable.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
